http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/=

Rocco

Just to be sure: Did you copy paste the code=
 or retype it? The Class1 should
not compile since it says throws new Illeg=
alArgumentException("fail");
rather than throw new IllegalArgumentException=
("fail");
Since you did not post the whole code it's hard to know wether yo=
u are using
jUnit4 or JUnit3. If you are using JUnit4 then the testmethod m=
ust be
annotated with @Test, if you are using JUnit3 your testclass mus ext=
end
TestCase and all tests must be prefixed with test (like your testMethod=
1)

/J
